content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Mr. Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I must say that the rental price for this 25-square meter apartment is not negotiable. It is set at a fair and reasonable amount that reflects the value of the property and the market conditions. If you are willing to accept this price, I can proceed with the rental agreement. If not, I'm afraid I cannot continue the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month for the apartment. Can you provide me with further details about the lease agreement?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Of course, Mr. Li. The lease agreement will be for a period of one year, starting from the date of signing. During this time, you will be responsible for paying the monthly rent of 500 Euros, which is due on the first day of each month. You will also be required to provide a security deposit of one month's rent, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease period, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the agreement.

The apartment will be fully furnished, including a bed, dresser, desk, and kitchen appliances. You will also have access to the building's common areas, including the bathrooms and laundry facilities. However, you will be responsible for keeping the apartment clean and in good repair during your stay.

In addition, you will be required to sign a lease agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental. This agreement will include details such as the rental price, the lease term, the security deposit, and any other relevant information.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

I am sorry, but I cannot accept the rental price proposed by the landlord. I will look for a more affordable option. Thank you for your understanding.

Goodbye.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to consider my offer, but I must respect your decision to terminate the negotiation. I wish you the best of luck in your search for a more affordable option.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out. I hope to hear from you soon.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
